Description:
Discover how the Employee Self-Service Agent is redefining the future of employee support with a single front door agent for HR and IT tasks. This session includes a product deep dive and live demo for a look into how the agent simplifies employee support, automates workflows, and integrates with systems like ServiceNow, Workday, and SAP SuccessFactors, including seamless agent-to-agent handoffs â€” reducing ticket volume, boosting employee satisfaction, and streamlining service delivery.

Delivered in a silent stage breakout.
